TextBlock.Text: HYACINTH: This dark corner really clears my mind.
HYACINTH: Anyways, it seems the burning of that building was intentional, they arrived at the eye.
HYACINTH: After scanning it with the staff I saw in that lab, they recieved a vision from the Eye.
HYACINTH: This vision depicts the Eye wiping out the entire solar system, and grass grows from their corpses.
HYACINTH: Are the other Nomai working towards their demise?
